result.eng: I help her from time to time.
result.ga: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.orig: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.html: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.

result.eng: I usually work late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag obair déanach san oícheI usually work late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair déanaċ san oíċeI usually work late at night.

result.eng: I work late sometimes.

result.html: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireantaI work late sometimes.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair go déanaċ uaireantaI work late sometimes.

result.eng: I'm always biking against the wind.
result.ga: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí
result.orig: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí

result.ponchtml: Bím ag roṫaíoċt in aġaiḋ na gaoiṫe i gcónaíI'm always biking against the wind.

result.eng: I am always thinking of you.
result.ga: Bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaí
result.orig: Bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaí
result.html: Bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaíI am always thinking of you.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag smaoineaṁ ort i gcónaíI am always thinking of you.

result.eng: I listen to the radio in the morning.

result.ponchtml: Bím ag éisteaċt leis an raidió ar maidinI listen to the radio in the morning.

result.eng: I am a widow and I do what I like.
result.ga: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féin
result.html: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féinI am a widow and I do what I like.

result.eng: I [usually] knit on Saturdays.

result.ponchtml: Bím ag cniotáil ar an SaṫarnI [usually] knit on Saturdays.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.

result.orig: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil

result.eng: I [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.

result.eng: I often go rowing in the curach.

result.eng: I watch TV till late at night.

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr

result.eng: I'm at home every evening around six o'clock.
result.ga: Bím sa bhaile gach tráthnóna timpeall a sé a chlog

result.eng: I take part in plays: I'm a member of a drama society.

result.ga: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlog

result.eng: I'm at work around nine.

result.ponchtml: Bím san obair timpeall a naoiI'm at work around nine.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.

result.eng: Don't cry! Be patient! {to self}
